import React, { useState } from 'react' import '../styles/PopForm.css' import userFrame from '../icons/frame.png' import clockIcon from '../icons/clock.png' import closeIcon from '../icons/close.png' import DropMenu from './DropMenu' export default function PopForm(){ const [role,setRole]=useState() function selectRole(role){ setRole(role) } const [dropDown,setshow]=useState(false) function roleDrop(role){ setRole(!dropDown) } return(
